src:
Story behind the photo: Discarded Gods
04 Nov 2019, 00:30 by Bangalore Mirror Bureau
Our reader took this picture of discarded idols and photo frames at the Mico Layout bus stop near ArekereThe picture was clicked by reader VIJAY PANDYA If you have a picture and a story to share, send us the picture with your name and number at mybangaloremirror@timesgroup.com
